A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without a single doubt in my mind this is the worst Star Wars movie. I don't have words to describe the damage this piece of flaming garbage did to such a beloved and incredible series. The only thing you need to know is that my father\, a man who has loved Star Wars since he was 18 years old and saw the opening scrawl of a New Hope slide across the screen\, has repeatedly said that the Last Jedi ruined Star Wars for him.
